features: 【Extralong battery life】：1000mAh lithium battery provides strong light up to 90 minutes after being fully charged. USB cable included for charging. You don’t need to worry about buying batteries. It is more convenient and environmental protection. It lasts up to a week if used for 15 minutes per day. It can be charged by a computer.

【Suitable for more scenarios】：It is suitable for Commute，car travel, hotel, university, office, gift and home. It’s like IPAD size, which fits well in a bag. You can take it everywhere. We've thought of everything for you.

【Suitable brightness】： There’re 72 LED lights. It comes with 3 color lighting modes: white, natural and warm white . You can select a desired color to avoid embarrassing situation for makeup. The makeup mirror comes with a light brightness control by the touch sensor switch.

【Simple operation】：The mirror can be self-standing. It has highly sensitive and long-lasting touch buttons. Short press to switch on and long press to adjust the brightness. There’s color temperature memory light function. It comes with a bonus of a small 10 x magnifying mirror.
【Storage and protection】：It comes with a velvet bag. This bag is for storing a mirror and other accessories. It can be easily put into a handbag, backpack, luggage case and is not easily damaged.

【100% SATISFACTION AFTER-SALES SERVICE】:Your satisfaction and happiness are our top priority. Our hassle-free customer service team will work hard to resolve any issues that you have with our mirror. If you're not satisfied with your order, please contact with us, we promise to return your hard-earned money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel mirror
reviews.reviewText: This iis a great travel mirror. It has three light settings, easy to use, and easy to tuck in a suitcase, or take to the office. I love that it’s rechargeable and not battery operated. It is well-made, and there are different ways you can position it to use it to the best of your advantage. It comes with a smaller 10 X magnification mirror that attaches to the larger mirror which is perfect for those close times you need it. I do like the little silk carring bag and it’s compact enough to fit perfectly in any suitcase or large purse.It would make a wonderful Christmas gift for anyone age 10 to 100. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little travel companion
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a cruise trip and it was just perfect. Small and convenient to pack and store. Easy to charge up and plenty bright to do my makeup. The three light settings are a great feature. Will be buying again, will make great gifts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very bright & perfect for on the go!
reviews.reviewText: I love this mirror! It is perfect for your vanity or on the go. It is able to close that way it won’t break if it is needed to be taken somewhere and also comes with a bag to put it in as well. I was not expecting the light to be so bright! There is also different light settings as well. I am so excited to start using this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazing and portable but may need more charging than you think
reviews.reviewText: I love its compact size and that the mini mirror can be suctioned anywhere on the main mirror. The stand feature works great and can be modified to a certain angle. The three different light settings work well and this thing can get bright! My one concern is the battery goes out at different intervals even when I’ve charged it fully (ie, when the charging light turns off). I’ve had the mirror turn off after 30 min of being on and then after an hour (both at same brightness) so I recommend you bring the charging cable with you. You cannot use the light when it is charging FYI.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to pack
reviews.reviewText: Easy to pack, great size and the lights offer a variety of tintness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for traveling!
reviews.reviewText: The mirror comes with a beautiful soft carrying pouch, a microfiber tissue, and a charging cable. Its casing seems solid and durable. The mirror is bigger than I expected, so that was a nice surprise. The magnifying mirror is also big enough for my purpose and having 3 colors of the light really helps. I have a similar mirror with LED lights that is bigger and more bulky, so I needed something more compact. This one was a great choice. Compared to my other mirror, I kinda wish this one was a tad bit brighter. It's definitely bright enough to do makeup, but I guess I would like to have it blasting in my face even more. Other than that, it seems like a well-made product although the time will tell how long the swivel part will hold up before becoming loose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not quite what I'd hoped for but good enough
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Stands up well and allows for changing the angle of the mirror. Light is VERY bright. Light color options are good. Rechargeable so no heavy batteries. Easy to pack.Cons: Battery charge didn't last as long as I would have expected, probably 5 days with about 10 minutes of use each day so bring the cord. The light is so bright it can cause a lot of glare. You have to get close so the light will actually be on your face. The magnifying mirror is too small to be useful in my opinion.For the price its probably the best you can get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a magnifier mirror to use it when I’m traveling and after a long research I found this one. I love it. It has different LED intensity also adjustable. It’s perfect to get my make up done. Good quality and very classy.
Decent size, it is ipad sized. Thin, perfect for traveling. Comes with a magnifying mirror. Would recommend to friends.
Product is nice, BUT it did NOT come with a velvet bag for storage, as advertised?????

I bought this for my local and overseas trips and so far I love it. the mirror is small enough to fit in most bags/suitcases but large enough to see my entire face as I do my makeup. I used it this past weekend in my VERY dark hotel room and it worked great. The suction mirror is a nice asset for any close-up makeup or skincare needs. Comes with a cute travel back and mirror cleaner. 10/10.

I’m very happy with this mirror as it is lightweight with a slimline design and perfect for travelling and I’m currently using it on my travels in Italy. Most of all I’m very happy that it is rechargeable. It’s a really pretty rose gold colour as well. I purchased another similar mirror from Amazon before this one, which was thick and bulky but needed to be plugged into a power point in order to work (or you could insert heavy batteries). So I couldn’t use it for travelling.
So lightweight, skinny, and easy to transport. Highly recommend.
